DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter open-label prospective comparative study of PET-scan and MRI at the time of diagnosis, after 3 cycles of induction therapy (RVD) and at the completion of therapy.
DOC.criteria: symptomatic de novo multiple myeloma less than 65 years of age enrolled in the IFM/DFCI clinical trial 66 years of age or more not eligible for highdose therapy Consindications to MRI or PETScan
